abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of design and
            construction of water supply facilities including treatment
            plants, transmission lines, distribution networks and
            metered house connections for Guayaquil and communities in
            the Guayas province. The project also includes the provision
            of funds for a water supply master plan up to the year 2000.
